typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		order_number as string,
		customer as string,
		apple as string,
		banana as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DSSRCUNPIVOT
DSSRCUNPIVOT unpivot(output(
		product as string,
		qty as string
	),
	ungroupBy(order_number,
		customer),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
Unpivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['unpivot_data.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> unpivotingdata
